item.title: Public void writePlayers()
item.dc:creator: @Bross Bross
item.description:
@Bross wrote:

guys, i got a weird problem…
here is what i got at the top in client.java:

public void writePlayers() { int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); sendFrame126("@cya@Brosscape", 6570); sendFrame126("@red@Owner@bla@:@blu@Bross", 6572); sendFrame126("@gre@ "+players+" Online.", 6664); setInterfaceWalkable(6673); setInterfaceWalkable(6568); if (isInBarrows()) { sendFrame126("@yel@Kill Count: " + killcount, 6569); } else { sendFrame126("", 6569); } }

and i got writePlayers below the boolean process.

when i get inside my server i can see it , but its changing its positions, bottom-right corner… top…bottom-right corner… top…etc

can someone explain why?

Read full topic
